subject: p18224196
History: -year-old woman with shortness of breath, to rule out cardiopulmonary pathology.
Findings: A large right and a moderate-sized left pleural effusion, have increased since the prior study. Consolidation has worsened at both lung bases, concerning for pneumonia, particularly on the right. Mild pulmonary edema is new. Moderate to severe cardiomegaly is unchanged. There is no pneumothorax.
